panels.description: returns the current number of idle workers
panels.title: Tasks IdleWorkers

panels.description: returns the current number of running workers
panels.title: Tasks RunningWorkers

panels.description: returns the total number of tasks submitted since the pool was created
panels.title: Tasks SubmittedTasks

panels.description: returns the total number of tasks that have completed their execution either successfully or with panic since the pool was created
panels.title: Tasks CompletedTasks

panels.description: returns the total number of waiting tasks
panels.title: Tasks CountCreatedWaitTasks

panels.description: returns the total number of tasks that were completed with panic since the pool was created
panels.title: Tasks FailedTasks
